laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Electrolytes, Glucose, Protein, Albumin, Globulin, and Bilirubin tests

laboratory_examinations.findings: Cytologic examination revealed poorly differentiated adenocarcinoma.

laboratory_examinations.date: Nine months after right lower lobectomy
laboratory_examinations.findings: New nodule 1.3 cm in the middle lobe of the right lung and multiple bilateral lung nodules (consistent with recurrent NSCLC).
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Disease in the lung was stable after chemotherapy, but new metastatic disease developed nine months later.

findings.EGFR_mutation: E746_A750del and T790M mutation (conferring resistance to available tyrosine kinase inhibitors).

laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Resistance mutation T790M developed at the time of acquired drug resistance.
